mapper.sql: ITEM_FLOW, ITEM_NAME, SCHEME_FLOW, ITEM_SCORE, ITEM_SCORE_TIP, ITEM_DESC, ORDINAL, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW, SCORE_WEIGHT, ITEM_TYPE, SECOND_LEVEL_FORM
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from PDSCI.SRM_GRADE_ITEM
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into PDSCI.SRM_GRADE_ITEM (ITEM_FLOW, ITEM_NAME, SCHEME_FLOW, ITEM_SCORE, ITEM_SCORE_TIP, ITEM_DESC, ORDINAL, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW, SCORE_WEIGHT, ITEM_TYPE, SECOND_LEVEL_FORM ) values (#{itemFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schemeFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemScoreTip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordinal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scoreWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secondLevelForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

where ITEM_FLOW = #{itemFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
